meanings.definition: A digit representing the sum of the correct digits in data, used to detect errors in data transmission.
meanings.sent1: The checksums helped identify errors in the data sent over the network.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include the checksums when sending important files online.
meanings.sent3: The checksums and the data had a little dance to spot any mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The checksums acted like detectives, uncovering any hidden errors in the transmission.
meanings.sent5: The checksums were like little detectives searching for errors in the data transmission.

meanings.definition: A value used to verify the integrity of data.
meanings.sent1: She double-checked the checksums to ensure the data was intact.
meanings.sent2: The system automatically generates checksums to maintain data integrity.
meanings.sent3: The checksums and the data held hands to make sure nothing was missing.
meanings.sent4: The checksums were like guardians protecting the data's integrity.
meanings.sent5: The checksums were the gatekeepers of the data's integrity, allowing only the correct information to pass through.
